entries.title_d: Your scanners is picking up the trail of a damaged fighter. It is probably one of the fighters that was attacking the mining convoy. Follow the trail and investigate this damaged fighter.
entries.title: Yavin System: Follow the Damaged Fighter
entries.split_quest_alert: The damaged vessel is directly ahead. Prepare to intercept and inspect that fighter. \#FF0000 WARNING!\#FF0000 Enemy fighters detected on an interception course. Defeat the enemy fighters.
entries.quest_patrol_d: Follow the trail until you can locate the damaged fighter.
entries.quest_location_d: The fighter is still inside of the Yavin system.
